node.excerpt: I used the Sony Nex-6 with the Sigma 18-50mm f2.8-4.5 lens. It’s a compact setup.  It’s a beautiful morning. The sun is shining. The sky is…

frontmatter.title: Sunny Autumn Morning
frontmatter.description: A Sunny Autumn Morning. I took a 10-min walk in the neighborhood after taking the kids to school.
